snippet: Chefs (and butchers and bakers) around New York City offer tips on converting every sandwich into a midday marvel.
abstract: New York City chefs offer tips for making superior sandwiches; recipe for coronation chicken salad, adapted from Tea & Sympathy restaurant, given.
lead_paragraph: Chefs (and butchers and bakers) around New York City offer tips on converting every sandwich into a midday marvel.

headline.main: Psst, Want to Make a Better Sandwich?
headline.print_headline: Psst, Want to Make a Better Sandwich?
